Text.Page:
The closest draelkar pylon is in Wendigo's Howl. Thulsa's got some Sihranar lackeys guarding it.

Slit those traitors' throats, or torch them—whatever it is you do to kill people—then destroy the pylon.

Quickly now! Thulsa waits for no .

Interesting. The wendigos are still aggressive, but they seem confused. I bet they don't know who to fight at this point.

Excellent. That's progress we can take advantage of. Fine work!
